description: Last week, a federal appeals court ordered Navarro to surrender to a federal prison in Florida on March 19 to serve his four-month sentence.
title: Ex-Trump adviser Peter Navarro to go to prison after Supreme Court rejects his appeal

description: In a fever dream of a retelling, America's new reigning king of satire has turned a loved classic, Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, upside down, placing Huck's enslaved companion Jim at the center.
title: 'James' revisits Huck Finn's traveling companion, giving rise to a new classic

description: What would you do if your favorite artist stared you down and asked for the truth? On this 8 Tracks: Michael Knott, Rapsody and Tierra Whack offer mirrors to themselves and to anyone listening.
title: 8 Tracks: Keep it real

description: A middle-aged protagonist struggles with his own sense of impermanence — and the return of his long-absent father. The Shadowless Tower is a subtle film that draws you in at every step.
title: A Beijing restaurant critic arrives at a crossroads in this absorbing family drama

description: Tom Stafford commanded the first Apollo mission to dock with a Soviet craft in space. He also served as commander of Apollo 10 - the dress rehearsal before NASA's first landing on the moon in 1969.
title: NASA astronaut Tom Stafford, famed for U.S.-Soviet orbital handshake, has died at 93
